sentences.english: We're gonna get together go to the wonderful light show on the mid-autumn day.

sentences.english: The Butter Lantern Festival is an important component of Tibetan folk culture.
sentences.chinese: 酥油花燈會是藏民族民俗文化的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: After the left-turn green arrow, a yellow arrow may appear.
sentences.chinese: 轉左帶綠色箭頭燈後，接着黃色箭頭燈會閃亮。

sentences.english: The program demonstrates the function of LED through GPIO configuration. LED will be flickering from left to right in turn.
sentences.chinese: 本例程演示了閃燈的功能，燈會依次從左向右閃爍。

sentences.english: Zhou Cun plays the part of the Yuanxiao lantern show that plays activity and week village tradition already widely known.

sentences.english: 《9》 China, Fujian Province Fuzhou first session lantern festival in south back street grand hold.

sentences.english: Taiwan"s 100th lantern in Maioli, My hometown."

sentences.english: Riddles are written on lanterns for people to guess.

sentences.english: Emperor of the Southern Song Dynasty fully supported lantern show.
sentences.chinese: 南宋的皇帝對燈會也非常支持。
